thread.title: Nice place for a second home
thread.title_full: Nice place for a second home - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lucas N
title: Nice place for a second home
text: The hotel is new, so everything is impeccable. Yes, the rooms are small, and I bet they are not for everyone, but if you don't mind and like this concept of hotel this is the place to stay, even in a couple. Location is also a big plus, since you can reach the subway easily and walking is also an option.
